None.Name: Crystalline Shock
None.Description: Every 3 seconds, unit casts shocks of crystalline energy that deal 372 damage to enemies in a 15m radius around the target, up to 558 in total.

None.Name: Infused Fealty
None.Description: Activate to conjure 1 squad of Snapjaws with an affinity towards Fire. They will have the same upgrade level as Satanael himself. While surrounding him Snapjaws will be infused by his infernal powers: they will then deal 150% more and take 50% less damage. Reusable every 30 seconds.
